nodes.text: Nez Peron was an Outer Rim agriworld and the homeworld of the powerful D'Asta family.
Nez Peron was planet of farming collectives. During the Cold War, the planet was controlled by the Sith Empire, who used it as an agricultural world. It was the site of the Battle of Nez Peron.
During the Clone Wars, the planet was located within Separatist space.

Decades later, the planet became the capital of the D'Astan sector, governed by the D'Asta family. During that time, the Nez Peron people suffered of starvaion under the rule of the Galactic Empire. Jahren Sinn was elected to speak on behalf of the farmers but Darth Vader himself came to Nez Peron and smashed the blossoming resistance. Jahren Sinn's wife, Mirith, later joined the Rebel Alliance.

Years after the Battle of Endor, Baron Ragez D'Asta seceded from the Crimson Empire following the dissolution of the Interim Council. After the Imperial Reunification, Baron D'Asta required Admiral Pellaeon to consider a truce with the New Republic as the cost of returning the sector to the Imperial Remnant.
